pageContent: Objective: High-intensity focused ultrasound (HIFU) is a minimally invasive treatment for prostate cancer. Data from the literature show promising oncological outcomes with a favourable side-effect profile. The aim of this study was to re-evaluate and bring up to date the follow-up of a previously published, prospective trial on HIFU as the primary treatment for prostate cancer.

metaData.source:
Minimally invasive ablation of a toxic thyroid nodule by high-intensity focused ultrasound
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/20075098/
